mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRD_NAME, PRD_BRAND, INGREDIENT, PRICE, CATEGORY, STOCK, RATING, DESCRIPTION, REVIEW_COUNT, BAUMANN_ID ) VALUES ( #{prd_name}, #{prd_brand}, #{ingredient}, #{price}, #{category}, #{stock}, #{rating}, #{description}, #{review_count}, #{baumann_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRD_NAME = #{product.prdName}, PRD_BRAND = #{product.prdBrand}, INGREDIENT = #{product.ingredient}, PRICE = #{product.price}, CATEGORY = #{product.category}, STOCK = #{product.stock}, RATING = #{product.rating}, DESCRIPTION = #{product.description}, REVIEW_COUNT = #{product.reviewCount}, BAUMANN_ID = #{product.baumannId}, IS_SOLD_OUT = #{product.isSoldOut}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
UPDATE QNA SET ANSWER = #{adminAnswer}, ANSWERED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE QNA_ID = #{qnaId}
mapper.select: SELECT POINT FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID AS product_id, P.PRD_NAME AS prd_name, P.PRD_BRAND AS prd_brand, P.INGREDIENT AS ingredient, P.PRICE AS price, P.CATEGORY AS category, P.STOCK AS stock, P.RATING AS rating, P.DESCRIPTION AS description, P.REVIEW_COUNT AS review_count, P.BAUMANN_ID AS baumann_id, P.IS_SOLD_OUT AS is_sold_out, ( SELECT LISTAGG(PI.IMAGE_URL, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PI.PRD_IMG_ID) FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE PI WHERE PI.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID ) AS product_image -- 모든 이미지 URL을 콤마로 구분하여 합침 FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.DELETED_AT IS NULL
SELECT q.QNA_ID AS qnaId, q.TITLE AS title, u.NAME AS userName FROM QNA q JOIN USER_TABLE u ON q.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE q.DELETED_AT IS NULL ORDER BY q.QNA_ID DESC

SELECT q.QNA_ID AS qna_id, q.PRODUCT_ID AS product_id, q.USER_ID AS user_id, q.TITLE AS title, q.CONTENT AS content, q.ANSWER AS answer,
q.CREATED_AT AS created_at, q.ANSWERED_AT AS update_at, q.DELETED_AT AS deleted_at, u.NAME AS user_name, CASE WHEN q.ANSWER IS NOT NULL THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변대기' END AS status FROM QNA q LEFT JOIN USER_TABLE u ON q.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON q.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE q.QNA_ID = #{qnaId}
